name: Deluxe Denver Omelet
description: Enjoy pillowy eggs stuffed with ham, sweet bell pepper, and a dusting of cheese, chive, and vegetarian bacon (hello, CCB Dip Mix). What takes this over the top is the lush drizzle of hollandaise sauce that’s made in the microwave. Yes, that’s right—the microwave.
preparation:
1. Dice pepper and ham.
  2. In a small bowl, whisk eggs, milk, and dip mix until frothy. Stir in diced ham and pepper.
  3. Pour into lightly oiled Omelet Maker. Close lid and microwave on high 2–3 min, or until omelet is set.
  4. Loosen omelet with spatula and carefully transfer onto plate. Top with prepared sauce and black pepper, if desired.
tips: Prepare Hollandaise Sauce the night before. Reheat in the microwave until warm, whisking every 30 seconds.
